findings.conclusion: BPM/Key sync from djay to Notion has NOT been executed. Script exists but extraction method needs work - djay database stores data in binary property lists that require decoding.
3,273 tracks still need BPM/Key analysis. No evidence of analysis execution.
Cross-reference between djay and Notion has not been performed. Implementation task still in Ready status.
iPad paths have NOT been synced to Notion. No File Path data found in sampled tracks.
